achievements.name: Craft Mastery

milestones.name: Legendary of the Craft
milestones.description: Reach level 99 with any town job.

achievements.name: Town Specialist

milestones.description: Reach mastery 50 with 10 town jobs.

milestones.name: Town Specialist

achievements.name: Town Job Mastery
achievements.description: Accumulate total town job mastery levels.

milestones.name: Novice Artisan
milestones.description: Accumulate 100 total town job mastery levels.

milestones.name: Apprentice Artisan
milestones.description: Accumulate 250 total town job mastery levels.

milestones.name: Seasoned Artisan
milestones.description: Accumulate 500 total town job mastery levels.

milestones.name: Master Artisan
milestones.description: Accumulate 1,000 total town job mastery levels.

milestones.name: Legendary Artisan
milestones.description: Accumulate 1,584 total town job mastery levels (all 16 jobs to 99).
